event.title: Talk about universal computing at Codemotion, Berlin, Germany

body.p: On Tuesday 3 November at 14:00 FSFE's President Matthias Kirschner will give a talk about “An endangered species: the computer as a universal machine”. The event takes place at Kultur Brauerei, Schönhauser Allee 36, 10435 Berlin – Prenzlauer Berg. Tickets start at 50€.
